#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int tc;
    cin>>tc;
    while(tc--)
    {
        int sum1=0,sum2=0,len,ans;
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        len = s.length();
        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)
        {
            if(!(s[i] >= 97 && s[i] <= 122))
            {
                sum1 += (s[i]-'A'+1);
            }
            else sum2 += (s[i]-'a'+1);
        }
        ans = (sum1+sum2)/len;
        if(!(s[0] >= 97 && s[0] <= 122)) cout<<char(ans+'A'-1)<<endl;
        else cout<<char(ans+'a'-1)<<endl;
    }
}
